backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten human summaries describing purpose of various frontend files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Deployment checklist outlining branding, URL, and guard verifications before release.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining custom OKLCH color variables and applying theme rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry with metadata, canonical URL, and root container for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component applying guards and metadata sync before rendering ValentinePrompt.
frontend/src/components/AppLoadedIndicat: Placeholder file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/CopyShareLinkCon: Share-link component that copies the public URL and warns against sharing admin-token links.
Interactive Valentine prompt with evasive 'No' button, success screen, and share controls.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Branding configuration defining recipient name, title, description, and success message.
frontend/src/config/publicSiteUrl.ts: Defines canonical public share URL with helpers for validation and retrieval.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and refreshing a backend actor based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth provider and hook managing login, stored identities, and status.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables, and custom romantic color utilities for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/adminTokenHashGuard.t: Detects and removes caffeineAdminToken from URL hashes and redirects to the public URL in production.
frontend/src/utils/appMetadata.ts: Syncs document title, canonical link, and Open Graph metadata with branding and the public site URL.
frontend/src/utils/legacySlugGuard.ts: Checks for a legacy slug in PUBLIC_SITE_URL or runtime metadata and throws or logs errors in development.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with extended OKLCH-based theme colors, radius, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project state, issues, and features related to preventing admin-token URL sharing and enforcing clean public URLs.
